name: WP Courseware for OptimizePress
author: OptimizePress

sections.description:
Fly Plugins presents WP Courseware OptimizePress.

Do you want to use the power of OptimzePress and create custom course units?

The OptimzePress integration for WP Courseware is designed to give you control of creating custom layouts for your course units.

OptimziePress Addon for WP Courseware Plugin

Shortcode

Simply apply the [op-wpcourseware] shortcode to output the WP Courseware navigation box.

Check out Fly Plugins

For more info about Fly Plugins Free and Premium Plugins, check out the following links:

  • WP Courseware LMS for WordPress.
  • S3 Media Maestro – Amazon S3 link encryption with HTML5 supported media player. Flash free & iDevice ready. Your media is now protected from internet hot linking.
  • Follow Fly Plugins on Facebook
  • Check out the Fly Plugins YouTube channel.

Disclaimer

This is not an actual theme. It is only the integration, or extension to allow you to customize WP Courseware units with OptimzePress.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the OptimizePress Addon for WP Courseware folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require WP Courseware to already be installed

Yes!

Does this plugin require the OptimzePress theme to already be installed

Yes!

Where can I get WP Courseware?

Click here to get the Best WordPress LMS Plugin.

Where can I get OptimzePress?

Click here to get OptimziePress.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Fix: Adjusted the priority when using remove_filter on the_contnet to match the the_content filter priority on WP Courseware

1.1

  • Fix: Fixed issue where dripped content was being displayed before the set time
  • Tweak: Added functionality for pre-requisite courses to match WP Courseware 3.9

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: This plugin adds integration between OptimizePress and WP Courseware to allow customization in course units.

screenshots.caption: The OptimizePress & WP Courserware unit metabox can be checked to filter out the default navigation box so that the shortcode can be applied which will output the navigation box where needed.
